import React, { useState } from "react" import API from "../../utils/API" import Form from "react-bootstrap/Card" function PtInitForm(props) { const [ptInit, setPtInit] = useState({ respondingUnit: "", ETA: "", criticalWarn: "" }) function handleInputChange(event) { // console.log(event.target.name) const { name, value } = event.target setPtInit({ ...ptInit, [name]: value }) } function handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault() // console.log(ptInit) API.createPatient(ptInit) .then(API.findMostRecentPatient) // .then(console.log(dbModel))) } return (
{/* */}
) } export default PtInitForm
